int num_of_children = 0; HttpClient httpClient = new DefaultHttpClient(); try { def creds = alfresco_user.trim() + ":" + alfresco_password.trim(); HttpGet http_get = new HttpGet( "http://"+ alfresco_host +":8080/alfresco/api/-default-/public/cmis/versions/1.1/atom/children?id="+object_uuid.trim()); HttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(http_get); DocumentBuilderFactory dbf = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance(); DocumentBuilder db = dbf.newDocumentBuilder(); String responseXml = new String(EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity(), "utf-8").getBytes("utf-8")); Document doc = db.parse( new InputSource(new ByteArrayInputStream(responseXml.getBytes("utf-8")))); doc.getDocumentElement().normalize(); file_uuid = ReadObject(doc); }catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage()); }finally { httpClient.getConnectionManager().shutdown(); } return file_uuid; } private String ReadObject(Document document) { def remove = "workspace://SpacesStore/"; def List<String> folder_list = new ArrayList<String>(); def List<String> file_list = new ArrayList<String>(); NodeList nList = document.getElementsByTagName("atom:entry"); for (int temp = 0; temp < nList.getLength(); temp++) { Node node = nList.item(temp); if (node.getNodeType() == Node.ELEMENT_NODE) { Element eElement = (Element) node; NodeList idList = eElement.getElementsByTagName("cmis:propertyId"); if(idList.item(0).getTextContent().contains("workspace")==false) { //System.out.println("FOLDER!!!!!!!"); folder_list.add(idList.item(0).getTextContent().trim()); Connect2Object(idList.item(0).getTextContent().trim()); } else if(idList.item(0).getTextContent().contains("workspace")==true) { //System.out.println("FILE!!!!!!!"); file_list.add(idList.item(0).getTextContent().replace(remove,"").trim()); } } } if(file_list.size()+folder_list.size()!=1&&file_list.size()!=1) return "Unexpected_error_container_folder_contains_no_documents!!!"; else return file_list.get(0).trim(); } private JsonArray getBlueprintSigData(String file_uuid) { HttpClient httpClient = new DefaultHttpClient(); try { def creds = alfresco_user.trim() + ":" + alfresco_password.trim(); //HttpHost proxy = new HttpHost("pytheia.noc.cityofathens.gr", 3128, "http"); HttpHost proxy = new HttpHost("10.1.20.68", 3128, "http"); httpClient.getParams().setParameter(ConnRoutePNames.DEFAULT_PROXY, proxy); HttpGet http_get = new HttpGet( "https://www.cityofathens.gr/intranet/moass/verify?uuid="+file_uuid.trim()+"&random_num="+Math.random() ); System.out.println("uri is : "+http_get.getURI().getRawPath()); String contentType = " application/json;charset=UTF-8"; http_get.setHeader("Content-type", contentType); http_get.setHeader("Authorization", "Basic " + new String(Base64.encodeBase64String(creds.getBytes())).trim()); HttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(http_get); String responseJson = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity()); JsonReader jsonReader = Json.createReader(new StringReader(responseJson)); JsonArray signatures = jsonReader.readArray(); return signatures; } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage()); } finally { httpClient.getConnectionManager().shutdown(); } } def uuid = Connect2Object(AlfFolderUUID.get(0)); if(uuid.contains("Unexpected_error_container_folder")==true) { System.out.println("no document found!!"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } else { def signaturesArray = getBlueprintSigData(uuid.trim()); if (signaturesArray != null && !signaturesArray.isEmpty()) { def appropriate_size = 1; if(signaturesArray.size()!=appropriate_size) { System.out.println("signatures array has not the appropriate size"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } else { if(loggedUser.trim().contentEquals(protocol_user.trim())==true) { System.out.println("loggedUser is : "+loggedUser+" and protocol_user is : "+protocol_user); def doc_last_signer = signaturesArray.getJsonObject(signaturesArray.size()-1).getString("uid").trim(); if(doc_last_signer.trim().contentEquals(protocol_user.trim())==true) return 2<1; else { System.out.println("doc last signer is not protocol user"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } else { if(loggedUser.trim().contentEquals("a.koutsaftis")==true||loggedUser.trim().contentEquals("v.kaliakouda")==true) { System.out.println("superadmins_case ---- loggedUser is : "+loggedUser); return 2<1; }else { System.out.println("within else ---- loggedUser is : "+loggedUser+" and protocol_user is : "+protocol_user); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } } } else { System.out.println("signatures array is null or empty"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } }

def List<String> folder_list = new ArrayList<String>(); def List<String> file_list = new ArrayList<String>(); NodeList nList = document.getElementsByTagName("atom:entry"); for (int temp = 0; temp < nList.getLength(); temp++) { Node node = nList.item(temp); if (node.getNodeType() == Node.ELEMENT_NODE) { Element eElement = (Element) node; NodeList idList = eElement.getElementsByTagName("cmis:propertyId"); if(idList.item(0).getTextContent().contains("workspace")==false) { //System.out.println("FOLDER!!!!!!!"); folder_list.add(idList.item(0).getTextContent().trim()); Connect2Object(idList.item(0).getTextContent().trim()); } else if(idList.item(0).getTextContent().contains("workspace")==true) { //System.out.println("FILE!!!!!!!"); file_list.add(idList.item(0).getTextContent().replace(remove,"").trim()); } } } if(file_list.size()+folder_list.size()!=1&&file_list.size()!=1) return "Unexpected_error_container_folder_contains_no_documents!!!"; else return file_list.get(0).trim(); } private JsonArray getBlueprintSigData(String file_uuid) { HttpClient httpClient = new DefaultHttpClient(); try { def creds = alfresco_user.trim() + ":" + alfresco_password.trim(); //HttpHost proxy = new HttpHost("pytheia.noc.cityofathens.gr", 3128, "http"); HttpHost proxy = new HttpHost("10.1.20.68", 3128, "http"); httpClient.getParams().setParameter(ConnRoutePNames.DEFAULT_PROXY, proxy); HttpGet http_get = new HttpGet( "https://www.cityofathens.gr/intranet/moass/verify?uuid="+file_uuid.trim()+"&random_num="+Math.random() ); System.out.println("uri is : "+http_get.getURI().getRawPath()); String contentType = " application/json;charset=UTF-8"; http_get.setHeader("Content-type", contentType); http_get.setHeader("Authorization", "Basic " + new String(Base64.encodeBase64String(creds.getBytes())).trim()); HttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(http_get); String responseJson = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity()); JsonReader jsonReader = Json.createReader(new StringReader(responseJson)); JsonArray signatures = jsonReader.readArray(); return signatures; } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage()); } finally { httpClient.getConnectionManager().shutdown(); } } if(terminate!=true && idle_case!=true) { def uuid = Connect2Object(AlfFolderUUID.get(0)); if(uuid.contains("Unexpected_error_container_folder")==true) { System.out.println("No file found"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } else { def signaturesArray = getBlueprintSigData(uuid); if (signaturesArray != null && !signaturesArray.isEmpty()) { def appropriate_size = 1; if(signaturesArray.size()!=appropriate_size) { System.out.println("Not appropriate number of signatures in document -- signaturesArray.size() is : "+signaturesArray.size().toString()); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } else { if(loggedUser.trim().contentEquals(eisigitis.trim())==true) { System.out.println("loggedUser is : "+loggedUser+" and eisigitis is : "+eisigitis); def doc_last_signer = signaturesArray.getJsonObject(signaturesArray.size()-1).getString("uid").trim(); if(doc_last_signer.trim().contentEquals(eisigitis.trim())==true) return 2<1; else { System.out.println("doc last signer is not eisigitis"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } else { if(loggedUser.trim().contentEquals("a.koutsaftis")==true||loggedUser.trim().contentEquals("v.kaliakouda")==true) { System.out.println("superadmins_case ---- loggedUser is : "+loggedUser); return 2<1; }else { System.out.println("within else ---- loggedUser is : "+loggedUser+" and eisigitis is : "+eisigitis); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } } }else { System.out.println("signaturesArray.size() is null or empty"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } }else { System.out.println("terminate is : "+terminate.toString() + " idle_case is : "+idle_case.toString()); return 2<1; }

HttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(http_get); String responseJson = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity()); JsonReader jsonReader = Json.createReader(new StringReader(responseJson)); JsonArray signatures = jsonReader.readArray(); return signatures; } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage()); } finally { httpClient.getConnectionManager().shutdown(); } } if(approval!=2&&approval!=3) { def signaturesArray = getBlueprintSigData(blueprint_uuid.trim()); i<task_candidates.size(); i++) { if((employee_supervisor['uid'].toString().trim().concat(employee_director['uid'].toString().trim())).trim().replaceAll("[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}]+", "_").contains(task_candidates.get(i).trim().replaceAll("[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}]+", "_"))==true) { temp_task_user = task_candidates.get(i).trim(); else { System.out.println("doc last signer is not appropriate task user"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } else { System.out.println("no task user acquired!!"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } } }else { System.out.println("signatures array is null or empty"); deleteActEvents(); return 1<2; } }else return 2<1;
